items.text: back of length outside off, punched towards cover
items.postText: Nayeem: "@Sajib, while running the Batsmen is entering the crease, where as the bowler is already in the crease, he hasn't left out completely to be called as No-Ball, similar to Stumping, where the Batsmen will not be accounted for leaving crease until he's 100% outside the crease." -- I compare it with the fielder near the boundary, he can be in the air and beyond the line and it will be all fine
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Allen, no run

items.text: fuller outside off, use of feet to hit it towards long-off, along the ground
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, 1 run

items.text: length, on the stumps, punched back towards the bowler
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Allen, no run

items.text: slower, on middle and leg, defended
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Allen, no run

items.preText: Damian: "W.I are beyond strange, Holder is captain in Test & ODI, Carlos is captain in IT20, however neither play the other formats, How is Carlos good enough to be IT20 captain but not good enough to captain in Holders place? Hope vs Bangladesh has been interesting... 'Hope' is the future! "Ironically""
items.text: and he gets off the mark with a six! Pitched up on the stumps, clears his front leg and hits it over long-on, all the way for a maximum
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Allen, SIX runs

items.text: length ball, on middle and leg, defended
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Allen, no run

items.text: slower around off, Allen goes for the sweep this time, gets a top edge and Mithun charges forward from deep square leg, takes a tumbling forward, inches off the ground
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Allen, OUT

dismissal.text: FA Allen c Mohammad Mithun b Shakib Al Hasan 6 (17b 0x4 1x6) SR: 35.29

items.text: back of length outside off, looked like a slower one, defended back
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Paul, no run

items.text: angling in this time, wide of the crease, chops it into the ground
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Paul, no run

items.text: an inside edge this time on to the body, was a length ball outside off, Paul was looking to work it on the off side
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Paul, no run

items.text: back of length outside off, defended this time from the back foot
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Paul, no run

items.text: back of length outside off, punched towards extra cover
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Paul, no run

items.text: back of length outside off, pushed towards extra cover once more
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Paul, no run

items.text: length outside off, stands tall and slaps it through extra cover for four
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Hope, FOUR runs

items.text: back of length outside off. Punched off the back foot towards covers for a quick run
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Hope, 1 run

items.text: back of length on middle and leg, tucked away towards square leg one more
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Paul, 1 run

items.text: down the leg side, keeps way too low, good take by the keeper
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Hope, 1 wide

items.text: punched towards long-on for one
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Hope, 1 run

items.text: length outside off, defended towards covers
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Paul, no run

items.text: fuller, almost a yorker, digs it out towards the off side
items.postText: Over to Saurabh for the last ten over
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Paul, no run

items.preText: Thanks Hemant. West Indies have got themselves right into a pickle haven't they? All quite bleak apart from Shai Hope
items.text: back of a length outside off, driven firmly. Opened the face of the bat too, but point dives to his left to stop it
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, no run

items.text: back of a length, nipping into him from outside off, he stays in his crease and punches to long-on
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, 1 run

items.text: good length, nipping back in again, he stays in his crease and swats it with a cross-bat to long-on
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Paul, 2 runs

items.text: length ball around off, heaved away to deep square leg
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Paul, 1 run

items.text: good length outside off, he moves across to flip it behind square. Clever shot, he saw there was a gap and Mortaza's relative lack of pace allowed him to execute it
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, 2 runs
